title: New: Okkah – Buddha Boy Speaks Stranger
body: Utah duo **Okkah** may well have just released one of the most exciting debuts of the year. _Budda Boy Speaks Stranger_ is self-described Symphonic Tribal Pop and to tell the truth, I’m struggling to find a more fitting genre title. Elements of Alt-J and Vampire Weekend fade in and out, particularly in the erratic, unpredictable percussion section, and deceivingly agile vocals. Check it out below. Buddha Boy Speaks Stranger by Okkah
